description:
Google has added iOS and Android simulators directly within its cloud-based developer workspace, Project IDX.  The search giant launched Project IDX six months ago as an experimental tool to streamline full-stack, multiplatform app development. It consolidates the complex workflows traditionally associated with building mobile and web apps into a single, collaborative environment. Pasquale D’Silva, developer... Read more »

The post Google adds iOS and Android simulators to Project IDX appeared first on Developer Tech News.
title: Google adds iOS and Android simulators to Project IDX
